title: Large-Scale Personalization Strategies in E-Learning Utilizing Knowledge-Based Models

context.prior_knowledge: Experience using basic online learning tools
context.additional_context: A course to enhance social sector job competencies through personalized content delivery for each learner

learning_goals: Learners can understand knowledge-based models and explain core principles of e-learning personalization.
Learners can autonomously organize content aligned with their learning patterns and goals.
Learners can revise and supplement personalized learning strategies based on formative assessment feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
